items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: Our pricing has two phases. Initial setup (first 2 months) includes complete preparation and campaign launch. After that, you can purchase additional services as needed.

items.question: What's included in the initial setup?
items.answer: Initial setup includes campaign configuration, strategy development, email writing, contact database parsing, and campaign launch. All preparatory work necessary for successful outreach.

items.question: What happens after the first two months?
items.answer: After completing the initial phase, you get a fully functional cold outreach system. For further work, you'll need to update your contact database and optimize message content based on data collected from the previous month.

items.question: Can I change or customize my package?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or remove additional services. Contact us for custom solutions that aren't listed in our standard packages.

pricing.title: Cold Outreach Packages
pricing.subtitle: Professional lead generation through cold emails to decision makers
